p: Analysis of pericarp and peel separately reported a diversity of xanthones in the form of the compounds peduxanthone- d ( 31), -E ( 32), and –F ( 33), standing out in the pericarp [ 33], which have shown anticancer activity [ 65]; meanwhile, garbogiol ( 34), present in the peel [ 33], has been reported as an inhibitor of α-glucosidase [ 33].
